name: Param Joshi
about: Enthusiastic Game Developer with expertise in Game-play Programming, seeking an opportunity to stand and show the vast skill set of not just technical skills viz. knowledge of Graphics APIs, game engine such as Unity, and Visual Fx, but also corporate skills such as team building, communication and friendly nature which everyone ‘Desires’ to work with. With a learning attitude moving forward in this deep & vast field.
